Description: The date when an entity ends. Used for class Course.
The date when an entity starts. Used for class Course.
A textual description or explanation of an entity or individual. Used across various classes.
Additional information or metadata about an entity or individual. Used across various classes.
The name of an entity or individual. Used across various classes, except Person and its subclasses.
The title of an entity or individual. Used across various classes.
Specific to academic settings, indicating a person's academic designation. Used for class Person and its subclasses.
A detailed account of a person's life or career. Used for class Person and its subclasses.
The birthdate of an individual. Used for class Person and its subclasses.
The academic qualification or degree obtained by a person. Used for class Person and its subclasses.
The email address of an individual. Used for class Person and its subclasses.
The given name of a person. Used for class Person and its subclasses.
The surname or family name of a person. Used for class Person and its subclasses.
The year a student enrolled in an institution or program. Used for class Student.
Represents the number of credits a subject offers. Used for class Subject.
The date when a document or assignment was submitted. Used for class Thesis.
